item.title: About
item.author: hans+vino AT viess DOT mn (Hans-Nikolai Viessmann)
item.description: For many years now I have been tasting a great many wines, but until recently I had not thought to record my experiences of this. Over time one begins to develop a sense for a particular grape, region, and even vintage; but I sometimes fail to remember the name (or vintage) of a wine I tasted previously. This site exists to hold this information, including images of the label (and bottle) as well as a personal review.

item.title: Lagoalva Reserva 2016
item.author: hans+vino AT viess DOT mn (Hans-Nikolai Viessmann)
item.description: Lagoalva Reserva 2016 A very full-bodied, mellow wine that needs some time to breath, but which is a joy to drink. Fits well with most red meats. Bought Feb. 2020 in Hieber’s Frische Center in Bad Krozingen Price 11.89 Euro
